HOW_DO_I_BUY.A: We partner with exchanges across the world to make buying bitcoin easier for you. You can get started now by creating an account with our partner. Once your account has been verified, you can begin buying bitcoin with a bank transfer {{::text | translate}}.

HOW_DO_I_SELL.A: We partner with exchanges across the world to make selling bitcoin easier for you. You can get started now by creating an account with our partner. Once your account has been verified, you can selling bitcoin with a credit card or bank transfer {{::text | translate}}.

HOW_DO_I_BUY_OR_SELL.Q: How do I buy or sell bitcoin?
HOW_DO_I_BUY_OR_SELL.A: We partner with exchanges across the world to make buying and selling bitcoin easier for you. You can get started now by creating an account with our partner. Once your account has been verified, you can begin buying or selling bitcoin with a credit card or bank transfer {{::text | translate}}.

HOW_DO_I_BUY_OR_SELL_UNSUPPORTED_CURRS.Q: How do I buy ether or Bitcoin Cash?
HOW_DO_I_BUY_OR_SELL_UNSUPPORTED_CURRS.A: We’re working on that! In the meantime, you can exchange bitcoin for ether or Bitcoin Cash in the {{ ::text }} of your wallet.

CAN_I_BUY_UNINVITED.Q: How do I buy bitcoin, ether, or Bitcoin Cash?
CAN_I_BUY_UNINVITED.A: We’re working on that! In the meantime, you can exchange between bitcoin, ether, and Bitcoin Cash in the {{ ::text }} of your wallet.

WALLET_SAFETY.Q: What do I need to do to keep my wallet safe?
WALLET_SAFETY.A: Our Security Center can help you keep your wallet secure and ensure that you can access your funds even if you lose your password - all in less than 5 minutes. A great place to start is to enable 2-Step Verification to help prevent unauthorized access to your wallet and write down your Recovery Phrase to make sure you never lose access to your funds. We also recommend using a unique, random password that’s at least 16 characters or more.

WALLET_ID_VS_ADDRESS.Q: What is the difference between a wallet ID and an address?
WALLET_ID_VS_ADDRESS.A: You can think of your wallet ID as a username that contains numbers, letters, and dashes. It is only used to log into your wallet and should be kept private. Your wallet ID can be found in the welcome email we sent you when you created your wallet or in Settings -> General. Addresses are what you share with others when you want to receive funds. To find your bitcoin, ether, or Bitcoin Cash address click on Request.

HOW_TO_TRANSACT.A: To receive funds, the sender needs your address. Your wallet will automatically generate a new address for each bitcoin or Bitcoin Cash transaction you make. For all ether transactions, your address will remain the same. Click on ‘Request’, select the currency you’d like to receive from the dropdown, and copy the address to share with the sender. To send funds, click ‘Send’, select the currency you want to send from the dropdown, and enter the recipient’s address in the ‘To’ field and how much you want to send.

HOW_MUCH_TO_SEND.Q: How much does it cost to send funds?
HOW_MUCH_TO_SEND.A: While our wallet is entirely free to use, the small fee included in your transaction goes to the miners, who help power the flow of transactions on the Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Bitcoin Cash networks. To ensure your transactions confirm consistently and reliably, your wallet will automatically include an appropriate fee based on your transaction’s size and the level of network traffic at the time. If you wish to specify your own fee for bitcoin transactions, you can do so under 'Customize Fee.

WHEN_IS_A_TX_CONFIRMED.Q: How do I know if a transaction has been successfully received/sent?
WHEN_IS_A_TX_CONFIRMED.A: Transactions will appear almost instantly in your transaction feed which you can find by clicking on the corresponding currency on the left navigation of your wallet. While your bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash transactions are considered complete once they have 3 network confirmations, your ether transactions will be considered complete after 12 confirmations. This typically takes about 30 minutes for bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash and 5 minutes for ether, but can vary. Until then your transaction will show up as pending.

CAN_BC_SEE_FUNDS.Q: Can Blockchain see or access my funds?
CAN_BC_SEE_FUNDS.A: We are a noncustodial wallet and therefore do not have access to your funds. This means we cannot view your balances, make payments on your behalf, or prevent you from accessing your wallet. With your Blockchain wallet, you retain complete ownership of your funds.

CAN_BC_RESET_PW.A: At Blockchain, we’re committed to letting customers maintain full control of their funds. In that spirit, we never see or store your password, so we can’t reset it for you. However, we do provide users a backup phrase that can be used to restore access to your funds. Head over to your {{::text | translate}} to find yours. Make sure you store it somewhere secure and never share it.

BLOCK_TOR_TOOLTIP: Prevent IP addresses that are known to be part of the Tor anonymizing network from accessing your wallet.
SECURE_WALLET_MSG_1: We’re thrilled you’re using your Blockchain wallet! But it looks like you’re still not as secure as you could be. Securing your wallet can help keep funds safe.
SECURE_WALLET_MSG_2: Don't forget to secure your wallet - take advantage of our Security Center and keep your funds safe
ACTIVITY_EMPTY_MSG_2: Get started by adding some funds to your wallet!
SURVEY_ASK:
Would you like to fill out a short survey to help improve your wallet experience?
We value your feedback!

BACKUP_REMINDER.TITLE: Wait!
BACKUP_REMINDER.BODY: Before you sign out, make sure to record your backup phrase. This will allow you to recover your wallet if you ever forget your password.

TRADE_BITCOIN_REMINDER.TITLE: Did you know?
TRADE_BITCOIN_REMINDER.BODY: You can trade Bitcoin directly from your wallet! Check out our buy feature to top off your balance.

WHAT_DO_YOU_THINK: What do you think of Blockchain Wallet?
DEAUTH_EXPLAIN: Click the button below to require email authorization the next time you login with this browser. Do this if you are using a shared or public computer.
DYK_CUSTOM_FEES: Want to set your own bitcoin fees? You can! Just click on Customize Fee on the Send screen.
DYK_RECOVERY: We never see or store your password, which means if you forget it we cannot reset it. Be sure to record your backup recovery phrase to ensure you never lose access to your funds. Find out how by visiting the Security Center.
DYK_RECOVERY_TITLE: Passwords are not shared or stored with us
DYK_TX_FEES: Transaction fees are used for sending bitcoin{{showEthereum ? ' and ether' : ''}}. To assure your transaction is confirmed by the network, we automatically include the appropriate fee based on network standards.
DYK_FEEDBACK: Our Wallet depends on you! Send us what you liked, loved, or hated to our team. All of the feedback is collected and reviewed directly by our development team.
DYK_BTC_VALUE: Your bitcoin{{showEthereum ? ' and ether' : ''}} balances will never change. However, as their exchange rates fluctuate you will see changes in the local currency estimation of your wallet balance. Simply click the balance to switch between bitcoin{{showEthereum ? ' or ether' : ''}} and your local currency.
DYK_BTC_VALUE_TITLE: Why does my balance keep changing?
DYK_TOP_SECURITY_TIPS: Keep your wallet safe and secure by visiting the security center to record your backup phrase and enabling 2-step Verification. We also recommend using a unique, random password that’s at least 16 characters or more!
WALLET_ID_EXPLANATION: Your wallet ID is like a username, you use it to login to your wallet. To send/receive bitcoin{{showEthereum ? ' or ether' : ''}} you need an address. To find your bitcoin{{showEthereum ? ' or ether' : ''}} address click Request.
WALLET_ID_EXPLANATION_TITLE: Your wallet ID cannot be used to send/receive funds
DYK_MOBILE: Download our mobile app and easily pair it with your wallet to use your wallet on the go.
DYK_MOBILE_TITLE: Use your Blockchain wallet on mobile
DYK_HOW_IT_WORKS: Client side encryption keeps you firmly in control of your funds. Not even we have access. Your wallet is encrypted within your browser before it’s sent to our servers.
DYK_HD_PRIVACY: If you use the same address each time you receive funds, it becomes easy for anyone to track your entire payment history. So we create a new bitcoin address for every transaction to give you more privacy.
DYK_DYNAMIC_FEES: We adjust your bitcoin fees dynamically depending on network conditions and the size of your transaction.
DYK_OPEN_SOURCE: All the code related to our wallet is open source. Contribute to the development of our wallet at https://github.com/blockchain.
DYK_FEEDBACK_VALUE: Help us build the next generation of features for our wallet.
FEEDBACK_THANKS: Thank you for your feedback! We'd be happy to get more in-depth feedback from you via
FEEDBACK_OVERALL: What's your overall impression of the wallet?
FEEDBACK_WARN: If you are having an issue with your wallet please Contact Support. This form is for general feedback of the wallet.
LOGGING_EXPLAIN: Record wallet activity and display it in your activity feed.
FEE_PER_KB_EXPLAIN: When the network is stressed, including a higher fee per kb will ensure faster transaction confirmations.
XPUB_WARNING: You should only give this Extended Public Key (xPub) to those you trust. With this information, they may be able to keep track of your payments, and may be able to disrupt your access to your wallet.
LOST_ID_DESC: Email me a reminder with my Wallet ID to my email address
LOST_PWD_DESC: Recover your funds with your 12 word recovery passphrase
REMIND_ME_HELP: Lost your Wallet Identifier? We'll send it to you via your email.
REMIND_SUCCESS: You will receive an email containing your Wallet Identifier soon.
CAPTCHA_EXPAIN: So that we know you're not a robot
CAPTCHA_INCORRECT: The captcha you provided was incorrect, please try again
LOST_2FA_DESC: Reset two step verification to regain access to your wallet
RESET_2FA_HELP_1: Are you unable to gain access to your wallet because you lost your two factor authentication (2FA) device or are unable to access your email account?
RESET_2FA_HELP_2: Please submit the form below and check your email for further instructions. 2FA reset requests are automatically approved after a certain time. The process will be quicker with more precise details provided to us. Your IP address and browser information will be recorded on submission.
RESET_2FA_WALLET_IDENTIFIER_EXPLAIN: If you forgot your wallet identifier (36 characters long containing 4 dashes), please
RESET_2FA_REGISTERED_EMAIL_EXPLAIN: Enter the email associated with your wallet. If you lost access to this email, please enter it regardless.
RESET_2FA_NEW_EMAIL_EXPLAIN: If you lost access to the email associated with your wallet, enter a new email. If the 2FA reset request is approved, this email will automatically be set as your new wallet email.
RESET_2FA_SECRET_PHRASE_EXPLAIN: Enter your wallet Secret Phrase here if you have one set. If the Secret Phrase is correct, your request will be approved much quicker. If you don't know what this is, leave it blank.
RESET_2FA_MESSAGE_EXPLAIN: Enter a message for Blockchain.info admins to review.
RESET_2FA_SUCCESS: You will receive an email with further instructions soon.
QUOTA_EXCEEDED: You have reached the maximum number of allowed attempts, please try again later
UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred, please try again later
RECOVER_FUNDS_WARNING: You should always pair or login if you have access to your Wallet ID and password. Recovering your funds will create a new Wallet ID.
STEP_2_RECOVER: Step 2 of 2: Create a new wallet
RECOVER_BTC_LOST: Recover funds from your lost wallet
YOUR_REC_PASS_EXPLAIN: Enter your 12 recovery words with spaces to recover your funds & transactions
REDIRECTING: We're redirecting you to your wallet now!
TAKES_A_WHILE: This may take a while. If your browser asks if you want to cancel the script, please press continue.
NOTIFICATIONS_EXPLAIN: Get notified when you receive bitcoin.
VERIFY_EMAIL_FIRST: Verify your email address to enable notifications
VERIFY_MOBILE_FIRST: Verify your mobile number to enable notifications
UNSUBSCRIBE_SUCCESS: We have removed your email address (and phone number) from our systems.
AUTHORIZE_APPROVE_SUCCESS: Login approved! Please return to your previous browser / tab to see your wallet.
AUTHORIZE_APPROVE_OTHER_BROWSER_EXPLAIN: Someone, hopefully you, is attempting to login to your wallet from a different browser.
AUTHORIZE_REJECT_SUCCESS: Login attempt rejected! Please contact support if this was not you.
SEARCH_FOR_BLOCK_ETC: Search for block hash, transaction, address, etc
MUST_SELECT_ORIGIN: Must select where to send from
ERR_ENABLE_IP_RESTRICT: You must add at least one IP address to the whitelist to enable Login IP Restriction
MOST_ADVANCED: The most advanced Blockchain wallet experience, now even more so.
SENDING: Sending and receiving Bitcoin has never been so easy
BUILD_TEST: We've taken our time to build and test the most user-friendly interface for our wallet.
SETTING_SELECT_ERR: Failed to change setting to {{ setting }}

SWEEP_FINISHED.TITLE: Archive swept addresses?
SWEEP_FINISHED.BODY: {{::archivable}} out of {{::total}} addresses were successfully transferred to {{::account}}. Would you like to archive these addresses now?

SWEEP_FINISHED_SINGLE.BODY: {{::archivable}} address was successfully transferred to {{::account}}. Would you like to archive this address now?

YOU_WILL_LOSE: You will lose all your bitcoins! Are you sure?
SURGE_EXPLAIN: The Bitcoin network is under a higher load than usual. To avoid any delays in confirmation, we recommend an unusually high transaction fee of {{ suggested | convert:'btc' }}.
HIGH_FEE_EXPLAIN: You specified an unusually high transaction fee of {{ fee | convert:'btc' }}. <b>Even if you lower the fee to {{ suggested | convert:'btc' }} ({{ suggested | convert:'fiat' }}), you can expect the transaction to confirm within the next ~10 minutes (1 block).
LOW_FEE_ERROR: Your transaction fee is too small
LOW_FEE_EXPLAIN: You specified an exceptionally small transaction fee of {{ fee | convert:'btc' }}. Your transaction may become stuck and possibly never confirm. To increase the likelihood for your transaction to confirm within approximately one hour (6 blocks) we strongly recommend a fee of no less than {{ suggested | convert:'btc' }} ({{ suggested | convert:'fiat' }}).
BALANCE_OVERFLOW_EXPLAIN: The send amounts will have to be lowered. You'll be able to review the changes in the next step.
DYNAMIC_FEE_HELP: Transaction fees are required by the Bitcoin mining network for most transactions. Changing the transaction fee is only recommended for advanced users.
SMALL_FEE_WARNING: Your fee is so small that your transaction may never be confirmed.

LARGE_TX.TITLE: Large Transaction
LARGE_TX.BODY_1: This is an oversized bitcoin transaction!
LARGE_TX.BODY_2: Your wallet needs to consolidate many smaller payments you've received in the past. This requires a relatively high fee in order to be confirmed quickly.

EXISTING_USERS_COPY: If you have previously created a Blockchain Wallet, click below to login.
HOW_IT_WORKS_COPY: Client side encryption keeps you firmly in control of your funds. Not even we have access.

MOST_POPULAR_WALLET: The World's Most Popular Bitcoin Wallet
ABOUT_BLOCKCHAIN_WALLET: We are not a bank. We cannot view your balance, see your transactions<br class='hidden-xs'/>or make payments on your behalf. You retain complete ownership of your money.

COPY_AND_SHARE_ADDRESS.HELPER: Share this address with others, and they can send you BTC directly to your wallet. Your address changes with every payment. You can also create a request by attaching an amount below.
COPY_AND_SHARE_ADDRESS.BCH_HELPER: Share this address with others, and they can send you BCH directly to your wallet. Your address changes with every payment.

TX_CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm Purchase
TX_CONFIRM.BODY: You are about to initiate a bank transfer.

TX_PENDING.TITLE: Order Pending
TX_PENDING.BODY: Your purchase is currently being processed. Our exchange partner will send a status update your way within 1 business day.

TX_SUCCESS.TITLE: Order Purchased
TX_SUCCESS.BODY: Your purchase was successful! Bitcoins were sent to {{::label}}.

TX_IN_REVIEW.TITLE: Transaction in review.
TX_IN_REVIEW.BODY: Your card was charged and the purchase is currently under review. This process will complete within one business day. In case your order cannot be processed, a refund will be issued and appear in your card statement within a few days. Thank you for your patience!

TX_EXPIRED.TITLE: Transaction expired.
TX_EXPIRED.BODY: This transaction is expired. Click Try Again to buy bitcoin.

TX_CARD_REJECTED.TITLE: Transaction {{::state}}
TX_CARD_REJECTED.BODY: Your purchase was rejected after being flagged by an automatic risk evaluation. Unfortunately, the reason cannot be disclosed due to security regulations. An automatic refund has been issued and should appear in your card statement within a few days. We apologise for the inconvenience.

TX_BANK_TRANSFER.BODY:
Please send {{::amt}} {{::curr}} to Coinify's bank account below within the next 48 hours.

Funds must come from your bank account, which needs to be in the same name as your government issued ID. Coinify will reject any transfers from third party accounts not in your name.

TX_AWAITING_REF_NUMBER.TITLE: Bank Transfer
TX_AWAITING_REF_NUMBER.BODY: Please send {{::amount}} electronically (via IMPS, NEFT, or RTGS) to Unocoin's bank account below before continuing. You will then need to provide the bank transfer reference number. Please use the same bank account that was used to create the account.

TX_INITIATED.TITLE: Trade Initiated
TX_INITIATED.BODY:
An email confirmation will be sent to {{::email}}.
You can expect your BTC in 3-5 days.

BITCOIN_RECEIVED.TITLE: Bitcoin received!
BITCOIN_RECEIVED.BODY:
You have just received the bitcoins you purchased!
Bitcoins were sent to {{::label}}.

KYC_REJECTED.TITLE: Identity Verification Denied
KYC_REJECTED.BODY: There was an issue verifying your identity with the documents provided. Please try uploading different identification. Bank transfers are unavailable until we can successfully verify your identity.

KYC_UPDATES_REQUESTED.BODY: There was an issue verifying your identity with the documents provided. More information is needed.

LANDING.SUB_HEADER: Blockchain is the world’s most popular bitcoin wallet. We are on a mission to build a more open, accessible, and fair financial future, one piece of software at a time.
LANDING.SUB_HEADER_ETH: Blockchain is the world’s most popular digital wallet. We are on a mission to build a more open, accessible, and fair financial future, one piece of software at a time.
LANDING.LOVED_BY_ALL: Loved by Users. Praised by Geeks. Recognized by the Press.

SIMPLE.TITLE: Simple
SIMPLE.COPY: We make using bitcoin safe, simple, and fun. Securely store your bitcoin and instantly transact with anyone in the world.
SIMPLE.COPY_ETH: We make using bitcoin and ether safe, simple, and fun. Securely store your bitcoin and instantly transact with anyone in the world.

SAFE_AND_SECURE.TITLE: Safe & Secure
SAFE_AND_SECURE.COPY: Our step-by-step Security Center helps you backup your funds, and protect them from unauthorized access.

BUY_AND_SELL.TITLE: Buy & Sell
BUY_AND_SELL.COPY: Blockchain works with exchange partners all around the world to make buying bitcoin in your wallet both a seamless and secure experience.

SOPHISTICATED.TITLE: Sophisticated
SOPHISTICATED.COPY: Hierarchical deterministic addresses. Dynamic transaction fees. Monitoring and spending from Watch Only addresses.

GLOBAL.TITLE: Global
GLOBAL.COPY: 140+ countries served. 20+ currency conversion rates, including JPY, RUB, SGD, USD, CNY, EUR, GBP, and many more. 25+ languages

SUPPORTED.TITLE: Always Supported
SUPPORTED.COPY: Should you need help or have a question, our best in class support team will always be there for you.

BITCOIN_ON_ALL_DEVICES.SUB_TEXT: Access your bitcoin wallet securely anywhere you go.

NEW_TO_BITCOIN.SUB_TEXT: Like paper money and gold before it, bitcoin is a currency that allows parties to exchange value. Unlike it’s predecessors, bitcoin is digital and decentralized. For the first time in history, people can exchange value without intermediaries which translates to greater control of funds and lower fees.
NEW_TO_BITCOIN.SUB_TEXT_ETH: Like paper money and gold before it, bitcoin and ether allow parties to exchange value. Unlike their predecessors, they are digital and decentralized. For the first time in history, people can exchange value without intermediaries which translates to greater control of funds and lower fees.

ISX.REVIEWING: Your request for authentication has been submitted and will be reviewed shortly. Coinify will email you a status update within 48 business hours. If you have any questions about the status of your submission, feel free to reach out to Coinify directly at www.coinify.com/support.

RECEIVE_HELPER: Copy a receive address to your clipboard.

DOWNLOAD_OUR_APP: Download our mobile app on your Android or iOS device to use your wallet on the go.
SYNC_WALLET: Once you download the app on your device, tap 'Log In' and scan the QR code to sync your wallet.

MOBILE_LOGIN.TITLE: Log in via Mobile
MOBILE_LOGIN.SUB_TEXT: Follow these steps to log into your web wallet using your mobile device
MOBILE_LOGIN.STEP_1: Open your Blockchain App on your mobile device and go to Settings.
MOBILE_LOGIN.STEP_3: Using your computer's camera, scan the QR code that appears on your device.

EXCHANGE.BUY_SIMPLE_STEPS: Blockchain works with exchange partners all around the world to make buying and selling bitcoin in your wallet secure and seamless.
EXCHANGE.NOTIFY_ME_WHEN_AVAIL: Notify Me When This Becomes Available

CREATE.ACCOUNT_EXPLAIN: Accept Terms & Conditions to create your {{::exchange}} account.
CREATE.VERIFY_EMAIL_EXPLAIN: We just sent a verification code to your email address. Please enter the verification code to create your {{::exchange}} exchange account.
CREATE.CHANGE_EMAIL_EXPLAIN: Updating your email will also change the email address associated with your wallet.
CREATE.CHANGE_EMAIL_FAILED: Sorry, this email is already registered with {{::exchange}}.

VERIFY.VERIFY_ACCOUNT:
To verify your identity we need to collect some personal information.

This information will be sent directly to {{::partner}} and will not be saved to your Blockchain wallet. Any information provided is secure and safe.
VERIFY.FULL_RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS: Full Residential Address (you will need to provide proof of address)
VERIFY.ADDRESS_LINE_1: Address Line 1 (Please use your primary billing address)

COINIFY.EXPLAIN: Our exchange partner Coinify will process your bitcoin purchases. Click Continue to begin buying and selling bitcoin.

recurring_buy.enabled: Trades for {{::cardLimit}} {{::currency}} and below can become recurring orders.

COINIFY.tx_fee_required: Transaction fees cover the mining network cost to ensure transaction confirmation. Blockchain recommends a fee based on current network conditions.

UNOCOIN.EXPLAIN: Our partner Unocoin will process your bitcoin purchases. You will need to provide some information and link a payment method.

CREATE.VERIFY_EMAIL_REMINDER: Psst 👋. Already have a {{::exchange}} account? Make sure your email is {{::email}} for both your {{::exchange}} and Blockchain accounts. If it's not, you can update your Blockchain email
CREATE.VERIFY_EMAIL_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_ERROR: Hey 👋! We noticed your Blockchain email is different than your {{::exchange}} email. Make sure you use the same email address.

pancard.TITLE: 1. PAN Card
pancard.COPY: Upload or take a photo of your PAN Card, clearly showing your name and ten-digit Permanent Account Number.
pancard.HELP: Make sure the snapshot clearly displays your pancard number.

photo.TITLE: 2. Your Photo
photo.COPY: Upload or take a photo of yourself so Unocoin can verify your PAN Card.
photo.HELP: Make sure the snapshot clearly displays your face.

address.TITLE: 3. Address Proof
address.COPY: Upload or take a photo of your address proof. Your may upload one of the following approved documents that match the name and address you initially provided.
address.HELP: Make sure the snapshot clearly displays your name and address.

photo.TITLE: Acceptable User Photograph
photo.COPY: Selfies with goggles or hats are not acceptable.

pancard.TITLE: Acceptable PAN Card
pancard.COPY:
Minor PAN Card not acceptable.
PAN Card must be valid as per Government records.

address.TITLE: Acceptable Proof of Address
address.COPY:
Avoid camera flash on the details of the address proof.
Address proof must be valid at least for 6 months.
Address proof should match previous address entered.
Voter ID has to be valid in government website.
Address proof uploaded should be in English.

UNOCOIN.PENDING_EXPLAIN: Thanks for setting up your profile. You should receive a text message or phone call within 1 business day to confirm that your account has been verified. Then, you’ll be able to buy bitcoin!

awaiting_transfer_in.BODY:
An email confirmation will be sent to {{::email}}.
You can expect your BTC in 3-5 hours.

processing.BODY: Your purchase is currently being processed. Our exchange partner will send a status update your way within 1 business day.

completed.BODY: Your purchase was successful! Bitcoins were sent to {{::label}}.

cancelled.BODY: Your transaction has been cancelled. If the funds were withdrawn from your bank account, create a new trade for the same amount and use the original reference number.

SFOX.EXPLAIN: Our partner SFOX will process your bitcoin trades. You will need to provide some information and link a payment method.
SFOX.BUY_SIMPLE_STEPS: Blockchain works with exchange partners to make selling bitcoin in your wallet secure and seamless.
SFOX.ANNOUNCEMENT: We’re excited to announce that you can now trade bitcoin directly from your Blockchain wallet! You can get started by creating an account in your 'Buy & Sell Bitcoin' tab.

id.TITLE: Photo ID Verification
id.COPY: To verify your identity and confirm your country of residence, please upload one of the following government-issued forms of ID:
id.HELP: Capture the front side of ID, clearly displaying your identification number.

address.TITLE: Proof of Address Verification
address.COPY: To verify your billing address please upload one of the following documents. The document must be dated within the last 6 months, and should clearly display your address.
address.OPTION1: - Utility bill (mobile phone bills not accepted)
address.OPTION2: - First page and signature page of your lease
address.OPTION3: - First page of your bank statement
address.HELP: Make sure the snapshot clearly displays your address.

id.TITLE: Acceptable Photo IDs
id.COPY: You may submit a valid state-issued driver license, state-issued identification card, passport, or government-issued identification. Make sure the identifation number is clearly visible.

address.TITLE: Acceptable Proof of Address
address.COPY: You may submit a utility bill (except mobile phone bills), first and last page of lease, first page of bank statement, or DMV/voter registration form. Make sure it displays your address and is dated within the past 6 months.

LINK_BANK.COPY: Sync your bank account instantly by securely signing into your bank directly.
LINK_BANK.COPY_2: You can also manually add your account by typing your routing number and account information. Please note that manually adding your bank account could take up to 2 business days to process.
LINK_BANK.COPY_SMALL: (PS: Your bank information will not be saved to your Blockchain wallet.)

needs_id.REQUIRED: You need to finish creating your SFOX account before you can start trading.

needs_bank.REQUIRED: You need to link a bank account before you can start trading.

needs_bank_active.REQUIRED: This bank account needs to be verified.

confirm.BODY: Please review your trade details below. Click 'Confirm' to initiate.

processing.BODY: Your sell trade has been initiated. Your funds will be deposited into your bank account within 3-5 business days. Your order ID is: SFX-{{::tradeId}}

failed.BODY: Your sell trade has failed. Please contact our support team with the Transaction ID for this trade if you have any questions. Your order ID is: SFX-{{::tradeId}}

rejected.BODY: Your sell trade has been rejected. Unfortunately we cannot disclose the exact reason for this rejection. Your order ID is: SFX-{{::tradeId}}

completed.BODY: Your sell trade has successfully completed. The transaction will show in your bank account in 1-3 business days. Thank you for using Blockchain to trade your bitcoin. Your order ID is: SFX-{{::tradeId}}

sell.INTRODUCING_BODY:
We’ve partnered with SFOX so you can sell bitcoin.

You can now sell bitcoin directly from your wallet and have the exchanged funds deposited into your bank account.

Stay tuned! We are working hard to bring buy bitcoin functionality to your wallet very soon.

buy.COMING_SOON: We are working hard to bring buy bitcoin functionality to your wallet very soon.

TESTNET_WARNING: WARNING! This is the testnet3 blockchain. Your coins have no value here.
WHAT_IS_ETHER: Ether is a digital currency. Like Bitcoin, it enables people around the world to transact, save, and hedge their way to a better financial future. In addition to sending value, ether also powers the Ethereum platform.
WHY_SHOULD_I_USE_ETHER: As the Ethereum platform grows, more intelligent applications will be built on top of it. We want to give you the opportunity to start using ether now, so you'll be ready to use these products in the future.
ETHER_DISABLE_SEND_TO_CONTRACT: Sending to contract addresses is disabled.
ETHER_SECPASS_REQUIRED: You must enter your second password to initialize your ether wallet.
ETHER_SEND_RECEIVE_WHATS_NEW: You can now send and receive ether from your Blockchain wallet!
ETHER_SEND_SUCCESS: Successfully sent ether! Your balance will update soon.
WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM: Please wait until your previous transaction confirms
BTC_ETH_EXCHANGE_WHATS_NEW: You can now exchange your bitcoin for ether and vice versa directly from your Blockchain wallet.

SHIFT.WELCOME_INFO: You can now exchange your bitcoin for ether and vice versa directly from your Blockchain wallet. In a few simple steps, your exchange will be in progress. Note: exchanges usually take between twenty minutes and two hours.
SHIFT.EXCHANGE_NOTICE: In a few simple steps, your exchange will be in progress. Note: exchanges usually take between twenty minutes and two hours.
SHIFT.NO_EXCHANGES_EXPLAIN: You haven't made any exchanges yet, click here to start.

SHIFT.EXCEEDED_MAX_SHIFT: Exceeds max shift limit. Use max

SHIFT.CONFIRM_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT: Review the details below and click 'Confirm' to begin your exchange. The exchanged funds will be deposited directly into {{::to}}.
SHIFT.TX_FEE_EXPLAIN: This fee is used to send the outgoing exchange funds to ShapeShift.
SHIFT.WITHDRAWAL_FEE_EXPLAIN: ShapeShift will use this fee to send the incoming exchange funds to your wallet.
SHIFT.RATE_EXPLAIN: This rate may change depending on the market price at the time of your transaction.
SHIFT.EXPLAIN_QUOTE: This quote may change depending on the market price at the time of your transaction.
SHIFT.ACCEPT_TERMS: I agree to ShapeShift's terms and conditions.
SHIFT.EXCHANGE_IN_PROGRESS_EXPLAIN: Thanks for placing your trade!  Exchange trades can take up to two hours, and you can keep track of your trade’s progress in the Order History tab.
SHIFT.PARTNERED: Blockchain works with exchange partners to make exchanging coins in your wallet secure and seamless.
SHIFT.PARTNER_PROCESS: Our partner ShapeShift will process your exchange.
SHIFT.STATE_NOT_SUPPORTED: This service is not yet available in your state. If you would like to be notified when it is available, sign up below.

complete.BODY: Your exchange is complete. It may take a few minutes for the funds to show in your balance.

COINIFY_LIMITS.KYC_PENDING: While your identification verification is processing, your daily limit is {{ ::dailyLimit }} {{ ::currency }}
COINIFY_LIMITS.KYC_REJECTED: Your daily limit is {{ ::dailyLimit }} {{ ::currency }}. To try and verify your identification again, click here
COINIFY_LIMITS.HOW_LVL_3: To increase your daily limit further, you must complete a transaction of at least 1,000 EUR. 14 days after the transaction completes, your daily limit will increase and your yearly limit will be uncapped.

BITCOIN_CASH.TITLE: Bitcoin Cash
BITCOIN_CASH.WHATS_NEW: You can now send, receive, exchange, and manage wallets with Bitcoin Cash!

WHAT_IS_BCASH.BODY: Bitcoin Cash is a form of peer-to-peer electronic cash that was created after a fork of the Bitcoin block chain in August 2017. Bitcoin Cash has since grown to be one of the top cryptocurrencies, along with bitcoin and ether.

HOW_TO_GET.HEADER: How Do I Get Bitcoin Cash?
HOW_TO_GET.BODY: If you had bitcoin in your Blockchain wallet before the fork in August, you already have Bitcoin Cash. If you're new to Blockchain, you can get started with Bitcoin Cash by exchanging bitcoin or ether.

BITCOIN_CASH.PLEASE_NOTE: Please note: For now, Bitcoin Cash will only be supported in your web wallet. Support in your mobile wallet is coming soon!

BITCOIN_CASH_INFO: You can use your Blockchain wallet to store your Bitcoin Cash, send all of your funds to a Bitcoin Cash wallet, or exchange it for bitcoin and/or ether.
BITCOIN_CASH_INFO_NO_EXCHANGE: You can use your Blockchain wallet to store your Bitcoin Cash, or send all of your funds to a Bitcoin Cash wallet.

FEATURE_DISABLED.TITLE: Feature Disabled
FEATURE_DISABLED.BODY: This feature has been temporarily disabled. Please check back later when we are back up and running!

RECURRING_INTRO_1: You can now create recurring bitcoin purchases from within your wallet.
RECURRING_INTRO_2: Select 'Make this a recurring order', set your recurring preferences, and continue with your purchase as normal. Each time an order is processed you will receive an email to notify you.
RECURRING_INTRO_3: Recurring orders can be canceled at anytime.
RECURRING_BUY_WHATS_NEW: You can now create recurring buy orders in your Blockchain Wallet!
BANK_TRANSFERS_DISABLED:
Bank transfers are disabled while identity verification is pending.
Click here to finish/complete verification

eth.ANNOUNCEMENT: You asked, we listened. We’re excited to announce that your Blockchain wallet will now allow you to seamlessly send and receive ether!

bch.ANNOUNCEMENT: We're excited to announce that your Blockchain wallet is now offering full support for Bitcoin Cash! You can get started sending, requesting, and exchanging today.
